law.catch_line: National Consumer Database; Inclusion Of Commonwealth Portion In No Sales Solicitation Calls Listing
law.text: If the Federal Communications Commission establishes a single national database of telephone numbers of consumers who do not wish to receive unsolicited telephonic sales calls pursuant to 47 U.S.C. section 227 (c)(3), the office shall include that part of such single national database that relates to the commonwealth in the listing established pursuant to this chapter.
